授業目的: The purpose of this course is to develop students' reading skills, vocabulary learning skills and critical thinking skills.
到達目標: Students will be able to think critically when reading a variety of texts, identify key vocabulary and record it in a systematic way, and develop discussion skills in English. There will be additional materials focusing on science and technology.
